title: "Apple: Trouble In Paradise Or Undeserved FUD?"
text: "Apple faces challenges in China as the Chinese Communist Party promotes the use of domestic technology and Huawei releases a new phone line. Huawei's Mate 60 Pro is not competitive with Apple's iPhone 15
source_name: and Apple products will likely remain dominant in the market. U.S. sanctions hinder Chinese progress in catching up to Apple's technology
date: making it unlikely that Huawei will reverse its declining market share trend."

title: "Billionaire Investors Are Loading Up on Apple Stock. Should You?"
text: "Several billionaire investors have bought Apple stock in the last two quarters. They no doubt like Apple's strong product ecosystem."
